thread.title: BRIEF-Apptio Inc Announces Pricing Of $125 Million Convertible Notes Offering

title: BRIEF-Apptio Inc Announces Pricing Of $125 Million Convertible Notes Offering
text: March 21, 2018 / 3:55 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Apptio Inc Announces Pricing Of $125 Million Convertible Notes Offering Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Apptio Inc: * APPTIO, INC. ANNOUNCES PRICING OF $125 MILLION CONVERTIBLE NOTES OFFERING * ‍PRICING OF $125 MILLION AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF CONVERTIBLE SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023​ * ‍SALE OF NOTES IS EXPECTED TO RESULT IN UP TO $120.7 MILLION IN NET PROCEEDS TO APPTIO​ * ‍APPTIO EXPECTS TO USE UP TO $14.9 MILLION OF NET PROCEEDS OF OFFERING OF NOTES TO PAY COST OF CAPPED CALL TRANSACTIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
